Description: Magical gem; intaglio; green jasper with yellowy-green and brown spots; oval; bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: cartouche; ouroboros; two staves; a pantheos with bird and snake's tails and four wings holding mace.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (165)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (563) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/563)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G226 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9712 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
